item.description:
My birthday dance party with my favorite band. Hope you will join us for dinner or just dancing with the Instigators

This is my birthday party APRIL 12  (Friday) SINGLES SPRING DANCE at Nuchie’s, 164 Central Street, Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am.  Enjoy the evening and dance the night away to our live band - The Instigators.  This group is well known in the area and plays at such venues as Black-Eyed Sally’s in Hartford.  Be sure to come and bring your friends for a fun night!.  There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm to enjoy.  Dress to impress and door prizes.  State at the admissions table that you are from “Life Begins @ 50” or “The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!” and pay $15, after 9:30 pm pay $10.  For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 164 Central Street:  I‑84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right, park both sides of building.  Sponsored by Social Connections.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: My birthday dance party
